mapper.select: SELECT dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaYoteiYMD" AS DbT5221_ninteiChosaYoteiYMD, dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaYoteiKaishiTime" AS DbT5221_ninteiChosaYoteiKaishiTime, dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaYoteiShuryoTime" AS DbT5221_ninteiChosaYoteiShuryoTime, dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaJikanWaku" AS DbT5221_ninteiChosaJikanWaku, dbt5221Nintei."biko" AS DbT5221_biko, dbt5221Nintei."yoyakuKaoFlag" AS DbT5221_yoyakuKaoFlag, dbt5221Nintei."yoyakuJokyo" AS DbT5221_yoyakuJokyo FROM rgdb."DbT5221NinteichosaSchedule" AS dbt5221Nintei WHERE dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaYoteiYMD" LIKE #{ninteiChosaYoteiYMD} || '%' AND dbt5221Nintei."chosaChikuCode" = #{chosaChikuCode} AND dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = #{ninteiChosaItakusakiCode} AND dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosainCode" = #{ninteiChosainCode} AND dbt5221Nintei."shichosonCode" = #{shichosonCode}

SELECT dbt5221Nintei.* FROM rgdb."DbT5221NinteichosaSchedule" AS dbt5221Nintei WHERE dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaYoteiYMD" LIKE #{ninteiChosaYoteiYMD} || '%' AND dbt5221Nintei."chosaChikuCode" = #{chosaChikuCode} AND dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = #{ninteiChosaItakusakiCode} AND dbt5221Nintei."ninteiChosainCode" = #{ninteiChosainCode} AND dbt5221Nintei."shichosonCode" = #{shichosonCode}
